title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 106.7 - Student Certificates of Completion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 106.7 - Student Certificates of Completion

State Regulations

The Authority shall prescribe the form and manner of
issuance of ATAP student Certificates of Completion, which shall be deemed
expired three years after the date of the classroom or online ATAP session for
which they were granted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
106.7

Adopted

New

York State Register June 15, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 24, eff. 6/15/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
